text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Item keywords:
Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures
Comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards
text.Response A: Spin into action with the Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition! This pack comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure, and 3 collector game cards. You can transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures.
text.Response B:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures. This set comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

608.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack

Item keywords:
Spin into action, transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures
Comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure and 3 collector game cards

Response A

Spin into action with the Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition! This pack comes with 1 collectible Monsuno core, 1 transforming action figure, and 3 collector game cards. You can transform into battle with all-new Monsuno Cores and transforming Action Figures.

Response B

Monsuno 2 Core-Tech/Glowblade 40 Surge Edition, 1 Pack
